articles.description: In the photo, she's seen taking her picture in a mirror while wearing a skin-baring gold outfit that she wears in the movie.
articles.content:
She can currently be seen in the Netflix movie Malcolm & Marie.
And on Tuesday, Zendaya shared a behind-the-scenes selfie to her Instagram.
